### Need help to find a good domain? {.pt-3}

If you don't like any of the above domains, we can help you find a short and memorable domain name.
Fill the below form with the kind of domain you'd like.

```{=html}
<form 
  class="help-me-find-a-domain card card-body" 
  method="post" 
  target="hidden-form"
  action="https://docs.google.com/forms/u/0/d/e/1FAIpQLSdZXoFm93ZZDqbDCsWHOXixJkiO_oXlYCKOun2eN0hIwUKjWA/formResponse">
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label class="form-label">Your Name</label>
    <input name="entry.2005620554" type="text" class="form-control form-control-sm" placeholder="Jane Doe" required />
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label class="form-label">Email address</label>
    <input name="entry.1045781291" type="email" class="form-control form-control-sm" placeholder="email@example.com" required />
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label class="form-label">Domain Purpose</label>
    <input name="entry.1065046570" type="text" class="form-control form-control-sm" placeholder="Restaurant / Influencer / Youtube Channel / Women Products / Children Toys" required />
    <div class="form-text">What do you want to use the domain for?</div>
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <label class="form-label">Domain Target Audience</label>
    <input name="entry.1166974658" type="text" class="form-control form-control-sm" placeholder="Worldwide / USA / Kenya / Women / Children" required />
    <div class="form-text">Who is your primary target for whatever you want to use the domain for?</div>
  </div>
  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button>
  <iframe style="display:none" name="hidden-form"></iframe>
  <script type="text/javascript">
      document.querySelector('form.help-me-find-a-domain').addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
          setTimeout(() => {
              e.target.closest('form').reset();
              alert('Thank you, we\'ll get in touch!')
          }, 500)
      }, false)
    </script>
</form>
```
